00045         public static void SaveFile(string Content, string FileName,bool Append=false)
00046         {
00047             FileStream Writer = null;
00048             try
00049             {
00050                 byte[] ContentBytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(Content);
00051                 int Index = FileName.LastIndexOf('/');
00052                 if (Index <= 0)
00053                 {
00054                     Index = FileName.LastIndexOf('\\');
00055                 }
00056                 if (Index <= 0)
00057                 {
00058                     throw new Exception("Directory must be specified for the file");
00059                 }
00060                 string Directory = FileName.Remove(Index) + "/";
00061                 if (!DirectoryExists(Directory))
00062                 {
00063                     CreateDirectory(Directory);
00064                 }
00065                 bool Opened = false;
00066                 while (!Opened)
00067                 {
00068                     try
00069                     {
00070                         if (Append)
00071                         {
00072                             Writer = File.Open(FileName, FileMode.Append, FileAccess.Write, FileShare.None);
00073                         }
00074                         else
00075                         {
00076                             Writer = File.Open(FileName, FileMode.Create, FileAccess.Write, FileShare.None);
00077                         }
00078                         Opened = true;
00079                     }
00080                     catch (System.IO.IOException e)
00081                     {
00082                         throw e;
00083                     }
00084                 }
00085                 Writer.Write(ContentBytes, 0, ContentBytes.Length);
00086                 Writer.Close();
00087             }
00088             catch (Exception a)
00089             {
00090                 throw a;
00091             }
00092             finally
00093             {
00094                 if (Writer != null)
00095                 {
00096                     Writer.Close();
00097                     Writer.Dispose();
00098                 }
00099             }
00100         }

00285         public static string GetFileContents(string FileName, int TimeOut)
00286         {
00287             StreamReader Reader = null;
00288             int StartTime = System.Environment.TickCount;
00289             try
00290             {
00291                 if (!FileExists(FileName))
00292                     return "";
00293                 bool Opened = false;
00294                 while (!Opened)
00295                 {
00296                     try
00297                     {
00298                         if (System.Environment.TickCount - StartTime >= TimeOut)
00299                             throw new System.IO.IOException("File opening timed out");
00300                         Reader = File.OpenText(FileName);
00301                         Opened = true;
00302                     }
00303                     catch (System.IO.IOException e)
00304                     {
00305                         throw e;
00306                     }
00307                 }
00308                 string Contents = Reader.ReadToEnd();
00309                 Reader.Close();
00310                 return Contents;
00311             }

00313             {
00314                 return "";
00315             }

00356                         throw e;

00359                 byte[] Buffer = new byte[1024];
00360                 TempReader=new MemoryStream();

00364                 }
00365                 Reader.Close();
00366                 Output=TempReader.ToArray();

00370             {

00522         public static void CopyDirectory(string Source, string Destination, bool Recursive,CopyOptions Options)
00523         {
00524             try
00525             {
00526                 DirectoryInfo SourceInfo = new DirectoryInfo(Source);
00527                 DirectoryInfo DestinationInfo = new DirectoryInfo(Destination);
00528                 if (!DirectoryExists(Destination))
00529                 {
00530                     CreateDirectory(Destination);
00531                 }
00532                 List<FileInfo> Files = FileList(Source);
00533                 foreach (FileInfo File in Files)
00534                 {
00535                     if (Options == CopyOptions.CopyAlways)
00536                     {
00537                         File.CopyTo(Path.Combine(DestinationInfo.FullName, File.Name), true);
00538                     }
00539                     else if (Options == CopyOptions.CopyIfNewer)
00540                     {
00541                         if (FileExists(Path.Combine(DestinationInfo.FullName, File.Name)))
00542                         {
00543                             FileInfo FileInfo = new FileInfo(Path.Combine(DestinationInfo.FullName, File.Name));
00544                             if (FileInfo.LastWriteTime.CompareTo(File.LastWriteTime) < 0)
00545                             {
00546                                 File.CopyTo(Path.Combine(DestinationInfo.FullName, File.Name), true);
00547                             }
00548                         }
00549                         else
00550                         {
00551                             File.CopyTo(Path.Combine(DestinationInfo.FullName, File.Name), true);
00552                         }
00553                     }
00554                     else if (Options == CopyOptions.DoNotOverwrite)
00555                     {
00556                         File.CopyTo(Path.Combine(DestinationInfo.FullName, File.Name), false);
00557                     }
00558                 }
00559                 if (Recursive)
00560                 {
00561                     List<DirectoryInfo> Directories = DirectoryList(SourceInfo.FullName);
00562                     foreach (DirectoryInfo Directory in Directories)
00563                     {
00564                         CopyDirectory(Directory.FullName, Path.Combine(DestinationInfo.FullName, Directory.Name), Recursive, Options);
00565                     }
00566                 }
00567             }
00568             catch (Exception a)
00569             {
00570                 throw a;
00571             }
00572         }

00685         {

00688                 Uri TempURI = new Uri(Path.Combine(FTPServer.ToString(), FileName));
00689                 FtpWebRequest FTPRequest = (FtpWebRequest)FtpWebRequest.Create(TempURI);
00690                 FTPRequest.Credentials = new NetworkCredential(UserName, Password);
00691                 FTPRequest.KeepAlive = false;
00692                 FTPRequest.Method = WebRequestMethods.Ftp.UploadFile;
00693                 FTPRequest.UseBinary = true;
00694                 FTPRequest.ContentLength = Content.Length;
00695                 FTPRequest.Proxy = null;
00696                 using (Stream TempStream = FTPRequest.GetRequestStream())
00697                 {
00698                     System.Text.ASCIIEncoding TempEncoding = new System.Text.ASCIIEncoding();
00699                     byte[] TempBytes = TempEncoding.GetBytes(Content);
00700                     TempStream.Write(TempBytes, 0, TempBytes.Length);
00701                 }
00702                 FTPRequest.GetResponse();
00703             }
00704             catch { }
00705         }
